Story Title: As a host of a Christmas party, I want to see what drinks I can make that include hot chocolate because my parties are always themed, including the refreshments.

As a global traveler, I want to prepare myself for drinking in other countries by getting familiar with brands of alcohol from the country I am going to next, because I want to know what I like before I have to deal with a language barrier.
As a person celebrating National Irish Coffee Day on January 25th, I want to search for Irish Coffee and because I want a variety of options to indulge in as I celebrate.

As a person hosting a welcome party for of-age foreign exchange students, I want to find alcohol cocktails based on country of origin because it’s a fun way to celebrate where everyone is coming from.

As a freshly 21-year-old person, when I pick out a drink I want to see a video that shows me exactly how to make it, because I don’t have any experience with mixing drinks and don’t know what different words or techniques mean.
As a party host, I want to see commonly paired ingredients because I want to buy supplies that can apply to multiple drinks that allow my guests flexibility.
As a user, I want to see every cocktail on the site, because I’m just browsing and looking for something new.

As a person with a dietary intolerance out at a bar, I want to be able to search a brand of vodka and check it’s base, because I want to request my drink be made with a brand that suits my needs like a potato vodka instead of a grain vodka.
As a user, I want to be able to search for any category in the search bar,  because I want my search to be quick and simple, without having to any extra navigation.
As a college student, I want to search for drink recipes based on ingredients because I don't have a lot of supplies.
As a user, I want to search for a specific cocktail because I don't know how to make it, but I want one!
As a user, I want to search for cocktails made with specific brands of alcohol because I have a few favorites.
As a bartender, I want to search by brand for recommended cocktails so I can maintain my bar's brand alignment.
As a patriot, I want to see what drinks come from my favorite country.
As someone with Celiac Disease, I want to be able to search a cocktail and then read more about its ingredients because I want to know if the cocktail I'm having is gluten-free.
As a brand ambassador, I want to see what drinks I can make with my brand to promote it at an upcoming event.
As a bar patron, I want to see whether I was served the correct drink. I would like to compare what I see to a correct picture of the cocktail.
As a tech-savvy user, I would like to view this site on both desktop and mobile.
As a designated driver, I want to find virgin cocktails so I can enjoy the night with my friends while being able to drive home safe at night.

As a college student, I want to create a small bar in my apartment on a limited budget. I want to quickly be able to browse popular and classic drink recipes so I can decide what ingredients to purchase.
